title: Council Decision (EU) 2015/312 of 24 February 2015 appointing a German member of the European Economic and Social Committee
header:
27.2.2015 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 56/36
COUNCIL DECISION (EU) 2015/312
of 24 February 2015
appointing a German member of the European Economic and Social Committee
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union, and in particular Article 302 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal of the German Government,
Having regard to the opinion of the European Commission,
Whereas:
(1) On 13 September 2010 the Council adopted Decision 2010/570/EU, Euratom appointing the members of the European Economic and Social Committee for the period from 21 September 2010 to 20 September 2015 (1).
(2) A member's seat on the European Economic and Social Committee has become vacant following the end of the term of office of Mr Horst MUND,
main_body: Dr Dirk BERGRATH, Leiter des EU-Verbindungsbüros der IG Metall is hereby appointed as a member of the European Economic and Social Committee for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 20 September 2015.
This Decision shall enter into force on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 February 2015.
For the Council
The President
E. RINKĒVIČS
(1)  OJ L 251, 25.9.2010, p. 8.
